alert.note: Alert for Northwest Yell County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 3:10PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Logan and northwestern Yell Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 310 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stonehouse Recreation Area, or 14 miles east of Booneville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Danville... Mount Magazine... Belleville... Havana... Corinth... Waveland... Spring Lake Campground... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Yell County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Yell Excluding Northwest
